articles.title: European markets down as inflation hits 8 per cent, ASX to follow - ABC News
articles.description: The Australian share market is expected to follow Wall Street and European markets, with the latter experiencing losses after data came out showing inflation has been hitting high levels.
articles.content:

articles.title: Strategic Donbas city split down the middle as fighting rages; EU to cut most Russian oil imports - CNBC
articles.description: The European Union has agreed on a plan to block more than two-thirds of Russian oil imports as part of new punitive measures against the Kremlin.
articles.content:
Ukraine applauded European Union leaders for striking an agreement on a new package of sanctions against Russia that includes an embargo on most Russian oil imports.

articles.title: Poisonous hogweed infestation threatens to envelop European Russia by mid-21st century - Phys.org

articles.title: EU comes up with 'solidarity lanes' to move grain from Ukraine to Africa - News24
articles.description: The president of the European Union Commission has assured Africa that the EU is working on "solidarity lanes" - a method Ukraine can use to resume exports to alleviate a global food crisis.
articles.content:
• The EU says it's building solidarity lanes to help export Ukraine's agricultural goods to Africa and elsewhere.
